name: ShirtChooser
0:
”Alexa, ask Shirt Chooser to choose a shirt”
”Alexa, ask Shirt Chooser to pick a shirt”
”Alexa, ask Shirt Chooser to recommend a shirt”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shirt chooser
des: This skill is custom made for my dad so it can choose a shirt for him every morning.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
